repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains selected chapters of Śivarahasya. Aṃśa 7, Adhyāya 19-22. On front folio 4 lines in Tamil are written.

msItem.title: Śivarahasya

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 34 pp: 155-160, VOHD II,6: p: 713 entry . 2048

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śrīśiva ūvāca śive dakṣiṇakailāse vilāsasyāśrayo mama . śa yathottarakailāsastathaiva sukhaduḥkhadā . suvarṇamukha 1v 2 rī nāma nadī tatṇāsti śobhanā akhāṇḍabilvapatrāṇi teṣu tiṣṭhanti koṭiśaḥ . yajjalasnānamātreṇa mucyate sarvakilmiṣaiḥ . tattī 1v 3 re koṭiśāssanti bilvavṛkṣā manoharāḥ . akhaṇḍabilvapatrāṇi teṣu tiṣṭhanti koṭiśaḥ . suvarṇamukharitīre 1v 4 koṭiśaḥ santi śaṃkarāḥ .
msItem.explicit:
65v 7 ṇāṃ . māmeva pūjya māmeva māmeva pūjyamahamityanucintakānāṃ . sarvārthadaṃ sakaladevagaṇābhivandyaṃ siddhīśvarītvamanuse
65v 8 vyamumāsahāyaṃ .. iti śivarahasye saptamāṃśe śivagaurīsaṃvāde arūṇācalamāhātmye eka
66r 1 viṃśodhyāyaḥ . pārvatyuvāca kiñcakāra sa bhūpālaḥ karūṇākara śaṃkara . tat sarvaṃ vada sarvajña vista 66r 2 reṇa viseṣataḥ .
79r 6 ṣibhiḥ . satyametat samtyametat ityarthajamucyate . maheśān nāparo devassevyo mumukṣubhiḥ 79r 7 dvijāḥ . maheśād aparaḥ ko vā muktidatā bhiviṣyati gautamaḥ . evam ānandadā rājan śrutā taiḥ aśarīravā

support.p: Thick wooden guard cover. Dark Brown color with some white patches.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numeral in the left margin on the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Good state with some damaged corners.

listBibl.bibl: Shiv Rahasya Chapter 7 Part 1and 2 Series Nos. 375-376 Thanjavur Sarasvati Mahal Series , Published by Director Thanjavur Maharaja Serfojis Sarasvati Mahal Library. (available on archive org,) 1997

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
